resources.string: This app uses The Movie Database (TMDb) API for content but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren confront sinister forces in two spine-chilling cases involving a haunted farmhouse and a family possessed by dark spirits. (The Conjuring 1 & 2)
A skilled thief who steals secrets from within the subconscious must now achieve the impossible: plant an idea in someone’s mind through a complex dream heist. (Inception)
A betrayed assassin awakens from a coma and embarks on a relentless journey of bloody vengeance against her ex-lover and his deadly gang. (Kill Bill Vol. 1 & 2)
Amélie, a whimsical Parisian waitress, finds joy in helping others discover happiness while secretly navigating her own journey toward love and belonging. (Amélie)
Teenager Marty McFly accidentally travels to 1955 and must ensure his teenage parents fall in love, or risk being erased from existence. (Back to the Future)
Two detectives with contrasting personalities chase a sadistic serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as the basis for his horrific crimes. (Se7en)
Three friends wake up from wild bachelor parties with no memory of the night before, and must retrace their steps in a hilarious series of misadventures. (The Hangover Trilogy)
A group of children are haunted by a demonic clown that preys on their fears, returning decades later for a terrifying showdown. (It)
With Earth on the brink of collapse, a group of astronauts travel through a wormhole to explore distant planets and find hope for humanity\'s survival. (Interstellar)
An unforgettable blend of intertwined stories featuring hitmen, a boxer, and gangsters in Los Angeles, all tied together by sharp dialogue and brutal twists. (Pulp Fiction)
A frustrated man is temporarily granted divine powers, learning that being God isn’t as easy as it seems and discovering what truly matters in life. (Bruce Almighty)
Five high school students from different backgrounds share personal revelations and forge unexpected friendships during Saturday detention. (The Breakfast Club)
An insomniac office worker and a mysterious soap salesman start a secret fight club, but it soon spirals into something far more dangerous. (Fight Club)
A street-smart LAPD detective and a disciplined Hong Kong inspector team up, battling crime and cultural clashes in hilarious and action-packed ways. (Rush Hour Trilogy)
A cursed videotape leads to sudden and terrifying deaths unless its deadly secret is unraveled. A journalist races against time to uncover the mystery. (Ring Trilogy)
A U.S. Marshal investigating a patient\'s disappearance at a mental asylum discovers shocking truths about the facility—and himself. (Shutter Island)
A freed slave partners with a German bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a sadistic plantation owner in the antebellum South. (Django Unchained)
Forrest Gump, a simple man with a big heart, unintentionally shapes historic events while searching for love and understanding. (Forrest Gump)
When a theme park filled with cloned dinosaurs malfunctions, visitors must survive a deadly prehistoric nightmare. (Jurassic Park)
A cartoonist becomes obsessed with identifying the elusive Zodiac Killer, risking his safety and sanity in the process. (Zodiac)
A sharp London cop is reassigned to a sleepy village, where he uncovers a dark conspiracy behind a series of bizarre accidents. (Hot Fuzz)
A mysterious virus turns people into violent, rage-filled creatures, and a handful of survivors must navigate a decimated Britain. (28 Days Later)
In a world where time flows in reverse, a secret agent must use inversion to prevent a catastrophe that could end humanity. (Tenet)
A group of Jewish-American soldiers known as “The Basterds” plot to assassinate Nazi leaders during WWII, sparking a brutal and explosive revenge tale. (Inglourious Basterds)
On a concert tour through the 1960s American South, a black pianist and his Italian-American driver form an unlikely and enduring friendship. (Green Book)
High schooler Ferris Bueller skips school for a legendary day of fun and chaos around Chicago, inspiring those around him to live fully. (Ferris Bueller’s Day Off)
A man’s life unravels as suspicion and media frenzy erupt after his wife goes missing, revealing secrets and lies in their troubled marriage. (Gone Girl)
Two bumbling journalists are recruited by the CIA to assassinate North Korea’s leader during a televised interview, with hilarious and explosive consequences. (The Interview)
After the death of their reclusive grandmother, a family is haunted by horrifying secrets and a legacy of supernatural terror. (Hereditary)
A man with short-term memory loss meticulously tracks clues on his body to hunt the man responsible for his wife’s murder. (Memento)
A jewelry heist goes violently wrong, unraveling the loyalty, lies, and hidden identities among a gang of criminals in Quentin Tarantino’s explosive debut. (Reservoir Dogs)
